MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Harrison Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.57pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the underground cable fault on Harrison road affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:56PM on Thursday 25 February 2021.
